item.title: The first product on Unified Inbox's roadmap, Outbox Pro, has been launched
item.description:
Source: Unified Inbox website. Unified Inbox, a company specializing in unified communications as a service, recently launched its first product: Outbox Pro, a cloud-based platform.Â Outbox Pro simplifies and accelerates the process of creating and distributing posts across various social media platforms. This web browser extension, currently compatible with Chrome, empowers users to generate, share, review, modify, approve, schedule, publish, and monitor both original and curated online content. Multiple authors can collaborate on this content, which can be shared across Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-first-product-on-unified-inbox-s-roadmap-outbox-pro-has-been-launched/
